key.name: po-directory
key.description: Directory containing PO files to add to the translation memory.

key.name: restrict-to-filename
key.description: If true, only include files with a specified filename when searching the translation memory.

key.name: filename-restriction
key.description: Filename to which searching of the translation memory should be restricted.

key.name: max-missing-words
key.description: Maximum number of words that can be missing from a message displayed as a match by the translation memory.

key.name: max-length-diff
key.description: Maximum difference in length between messages displayed as matches by the translation memory.
